Pre-Game Insights: Heliot Ramos had four hits on Tuesday in an 11-0 win over the Diamondbacks.
Arizona has the best team on-base percentage in the NL at.337.
San Francisco has gone 33-61 in games when they have allowed a home run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks have an 87-71 record overall and a 42-35 record at home.
The Giants have a 38-42 record in road games and a 79-79 record overall.
This will be the 13th meeting between these teams this season. The season series is tied 6-6.
